meanings.definition: A person who emotionally and psychologically identifies with the sex opposite to their biological sex.
meanings.sent1: Some transsexuals undergo medical procedures to align their physical appearance with their gender identity.
meanings.sent2: The support group provides a safe space for transsexuals to share their experiences.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone was surprised when Bob showed up dressed as a transsexual.
meanings.sent4: Her journey as a transsexual was like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The documentary shed light on the challenges faced by transsexuals in society.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to transsexuals or their characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The clinic offers specialized care for transsexuals seeking gender-affirming treatments.
meanings.sent2: She conducted research on the social acceptance of transsexuals in different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer showcased a collection inspired by transsexual aesthetics.
meanings.sent4: His art pieces explored the beauty and struggles of the transsexual experience.
meanings.sent5: The film industry is starting to portray transsexual characters more authentically.
